title: Black Widow
plot: At birth the Black Widow "aka Natasha Romanova" is given to the KGB, which grooms her to become its ultimate operative. When the U.S.S.R. breaks up, the government tries to kill her as the action moves to present-day New York, where she is a freelance operative.
writers: Jac Schaeffer, Ned Benson, Eric Pearson, Stan Lee, Don Heck, Don Rico
stars: Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Rachel Weisz

similars.title: Loki
similars.plot: A new Marvel chapter with Loki at its center.
similars.stars: Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson, Sophia Di Martino

similars.title: Spider-Man 4: Fan Film
similars.plot: Spider-Man returns to face his greatest challenge yet as he faces off against The Vulture.
similars.stars: Bryn Clayton Jones, Leona Britt, Erik Franklin

similars.title: The Suicide Squad
similars.plot: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.
similars.stars: Margot Robbie, Idris Elba, John Cena

similars.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

similars.plot: The movie, based on Marvel Comics, will focus on Shang-Chi; 'The Master of Kung-Fu'.
similars.stars: Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung

similars.title: Hawkeye
similars.plot: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.
similars.stars: Alaqua Cox, Brian d'Arcy James, Tony Dalton

similars.plot: A continuation of Spider-Man Far From Home

similars.title: Morbius
similars.plot: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.
